about_the_game:
In My Plushy Shift, your Task is to collect around the Office. Sounds simple enough, though things get difficult as you start hallucinating about toys and - walking Plushies. Collect around all Rooms while struggling through the Plushy Hallucinations and attempt to uncover the source behind the appearance of these Hallucinations.

My Plushy Shift is a point and click Horror Game made in Unreal Engine 5 featuring:

SHIFT MODE: Play the Story Mode of the Game. Enjoy seven Shifts with changing difficulty and collect all five out of five Relics to figure out the Story of the Game through Cinematics.

RANDOM MODE: Every Shift is different. Try out a few Random Runs in Random Mode and you'll surely come across a few secrets here and there.

ENDLESS MODE: How long can you make it? Endless Mode is a Hard Version of My Plushy Shift and goes on endlessly, depending on your patience.

Can you succeed until the last Shift?
